Text: This is NOT their newest CD Blood. The Cd is The Dream from 2008! I just downloaded it and to my disappointment say that this was The Dream. Please relabel to the appropriate Album so others don't download it thinking it is Blood also only to be as disappointed as I am!
Please disregard my previous comment, found out why I thought it was The Dream. It was a album i was trying to download from someone else, and did not see this in my downloaded section!
